description.p: KMyMoney is a personal finance manager for KDE.

It supports different account types, categorisation of expenses and incomes, reconciliation of bank accounts and import/export to the “QIF” file format. Direct download using the OFX and HBCI formats is also possible via plugins. Online banking support (statement download) is also provided for the OFX and HBCI protocols.

screenshot.caption: KMyMoney has a welcome page to help new users get off to a good start.
The financial summary gives you an overview of your finances, including overdue and upcoming scheduled transactions.
In this view your accounts are organized, viewed, and managed by the institutions they are held at.
